Module jonix
Package com.tectonica.jonix.unify

Class JonixUnifier

java.lang.Object
com.tectonica.jonix.unify.JonixUnifier
public class JonixUnifier extends Object
This class provides static services for converting version-specific ONIX data into its version-less equivalent from the com.tectonica.jonix.unify.base package.
